pages.casino: Exciting Casino Entertainment at Emerald Dream About us Contact Us Our casino Welcome to Emerald Dream Casino Experience luxury and excitement at our premier casino hotel in the heart of England About Our Casino Welcome to Emerald Dream Casino, where sophistication meets excitement. Our state-of-the-art gaming floor features a wide range of games to suit every taste, from classic table games to the latest slot machines. At Emerald Dream, we pride ourselves on offering an unparalleled gaming experience. Our professional dealers and staff are dedicated to providing top-notch service, ensuring that your time with us is nothing short of extraordinary. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the world of casinos, Emerald Dream provides an inviting atmosphere for all. Join us for high-stakes games or enjoy a relaxing evening with friends in our elegant surroundings. Beyond the gaming, our casino hotel offers luxurious accommodations, fine dining, and world-class entertainment. Every detail is designed to make your stay unforgettable, with amenities that cater to your every need. Our commitment to excellence extends to every aspect of our casino. From the moment you step through our doors, you'll be immersed in a world of luxury and excitement. Our gaming floor is equipped with the latest technology, ensuring a seamless and thrilling experience. Enjoy a night of gaming and then retreat to one of our sumptuous hotel rooms. Each room is designed with comfort and style in mind, offering a perfect blend of modern amenities and classic elegance. Indulge in gourmet meals at our in-house restaurants, where our chefs prepare a variety of delicious dishes to satisfy any palate. From casual bites to fine dining, our culinary offerings are sure to delight. At Emerald Dream Casino, we also host a variety of entertainment events throughout the year. From live music performances to exclusive parties, there's always something happening to keep you entertained. We invite you to discover the ultimate casino experience at Emerald Dream. Join us for an unforgettable journey where luxury, excitement, and exceptional service come together to create the perfect getaway. Why Choose Emerald Dream Casino? Discover unparalleled luxury and excitement at Emerald Dream Casino. Our world-class gaming facilities, combined with exceptional service, create an experience like no other. Enjoy a wide range of games, from classic table games to modern slot machines, all designed to provide endless entertainment and the opportunity to win big. State-of-the-Art Games Our casino features the latest in gaming technology, ensuring a seamless and thrilling experience. Whether you prefer blackjack, roulette, or the newest slot games, we have something for everyone. Luxurious Environment Enjoy the elegant and sophisticated atmosphere of our casino. From the moment you step inside, you'll be immersed in a world of luxury and comfort. Exceptional Rewards At Emerald Dream Casino, we believe in rewarding our players. Our loyalty program offers fantastic perks and benefits, ensuring that every visit is as rewarding as the last. pages.index: Luxury Accommodation and Leisure at Emerald Dream Hotel About us Contact Us Our casino Welcome to Emerald Dream Experience the luxury and charm of England's finest hotel Our Hotel Nestled in the heart of the English countryside, Emerald Dream offers a unique blend of classic elegance and modern comfort. Our rooms are designed to provide a relaxing retreat with stunning views of the surrounding landscapes, combining luxurious furnishings with the latest in-room technology to ensure a seamless stay. Our hotel features a world-class restaurant where guests can indulge in gourmet dishes crafted from locally sourced ingredients. The menu reflects a passion for culinary excellence, with a range of options to cater to all tastes. Enjoy a dining experience that celebrates the rich culinary traditions of England, complemented by an extensive wine list. At Emerald Dream, relaxation is paramount. Our luxurious spa offers a haven of tranquility, with a variety of treatments designed to rejuvenate and refresh. From soothing massages to invigorating facials, our professional therapists are dedicated to providing an unparalleled spa experience. Guests can also unwind in our state-of-the-art fitness center, complete with modern equipment and personal training services. Meet Our Team At Emerald Dream, we pride ourselves on providing exceptional service. Our dedicated team of professionals is committed to making your stay unforgettable. Each member brings a wealth of experience and a passion for hospitality. From our welcoming front desk staff to our skilled chefs and attentive housekeeping team, every individual plays a crucial role in creating the perfect experience for our guests. We are here to ensure your every need is met with a smile. Discover the people behind the magic at Emerald Dream. Our team is ready to make your visit truly special. Contact Us James Smith General Manager Oliver Johnson Head Chef Henry Williams Front Desk Manager George Brown Spa Director I accept Privacy policy Address 145 Sussex Gardens, Tyburnia, London W2 2RY, UK Phone number +44-207-8301853 Email emeralddream@gmail.com We look forward to hearing from you at Emerald Dream. Whether you have questions about our services, need assistance with your booking, or simply want to share your feedback, we're here to help. Our dedicated team is available to ensure your inquiries are addressed promptly. Feel free to reach out via phone, email, or by visiting our address. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we aim to provide the highest level of service. Thank you for choosing Emerald Dream. We hope to welcome you soon to experience the elegance and luxury of our hotel. pages.privacy: Privacy Policy of Emerald Dream Hotel About us Contact Us Our casino Privacy Policy Introduction Welcome to Emerald Dream's Privacy Policy. Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website emeralddream.com, including any other media form, media channel, mobile website, or mobile application related or connected thereto (collectively, the "Site"). Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the Site. Information We Collect We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect on the Site includes: Personal Data: We may collect personal identification information from you in a variety of ways, including, but not limited to, when you visit our site, register on the site, place an order, subscribe to the newsletter, respond to a survey, fill out a form, and in connection with other activities, services, features, or resources we make available on our Site. Contact Information: We may collect your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, or other contact information. Demographic Information: We may collect demographic information such as your age, gender, preferences, interests, and favorites. Technical Data: We may automatically collect certain information about your equipment, browsing actions, and patterns, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, referring URLs, access times, and pages viewed. Your information is collected to provide and operate our services, for improvement and research purposes, to contact you with updates and marketing materials, and to comply with legal obligations. Use of Your Information The primary purpose of collecting your information is to provide you with a safe, smooth, efficient, and customized experience. We may use your personal information for the following purposes: To operate, maintain, and improve our Site and services To process your transactions and manage your orders To respond to your inquiries and provide you with user support To communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the Site, and for marketing and promotional purposes To detect and prevent fraud, unauthorized activities, and ensure compliance with legal obligations Disclosure of Your Information We may disclose your personal information to third parties in the following circumstances: To our subsidiaries and affiliates To contractors, service providers, and other third parties we use to support our business To fulfill the purpose for which you provide it For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information With your consent We may also disclose your personal information to comply with legal obligations, to protect and defend our rights or property, to prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Site, to protect the personal safety of users of the Site or the public, and to protect against legal liability. Security of Your Information We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Your Rights and Choices Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information. These rights may include: The right to access and receive a copy of the personal information we hold about you The right to rectify any personal information held about you that is inaccurate or incomplete The right to request the deletion of personal information held about you The right to restrict the processing of personal information we hold about you The right to object to us processing your personal information The right to data portability If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided below. Contact Us If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, or if you would like to exercise your rights regarding your personal information, please contact us at emeralddream@gmail.com. Disclaimer Privacy policy Terms of Use 18+ Please be informed that our site for Emerald Dream is restricted to individuals who are 18 years of age or older. Thank you for understanding. We use cookies to enhance your experience on the Emerald Dream website. By continuing to browse, you consent to our use of cookies. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy. Accept Decline
